scenario_text.value: Ow. Guess she dropped us down here.
Where’s here, exactly?
Is... Is everyone okay? Miyuki? Haru?
I’m here. And my sister is too.
Too...
Well, I’m glad you’re all right.
From what I can tell, everyone’s here.

Man, why would a castle in an amusement park
have a trap like that?

In this world? It seems to make just as much
sense as anything else. Then again...
Maybe someone made some modifications.
Who? The monsters?

You think...we could make something as
impressive as this?
Who knows?

After all, how would I know what sorts of
things you monsters are capable of?
Oh... Yeah.

I dunno. I feel like it wasn’t the monsters
that made this, but some other weird power.

Well, your sister sure is a piece of work,
Kaito.

I’m sorry. She hasn’t always been like that.
It’s just...something happened.
Like what?
She’s...been through a lot.

That’s why I swore I’d always protect her, no
matter what. Not that I’ve done a great job.

(Kaito does always seem upset when he talks
about Miu.)
(I wonder what happened.)
(But it’s probably better if I don’t pry.)

Well, I don’t know what it is that you and
Miu are dealing with,

but I think maybe you got a little over-
protective, and that backfired on you.
You think so?
I just worry about her, that’s all.

Well, sometimes it can feel suffocating being
on the other side of that.

(Hm? Was it just me, or did Saki look really
sad when she said that?)
Saki? Is something wrong?
Oh no, it’s nothing.
(Maybe I just imagined it.)

Anyway, we need to think up a way for us to
get out of here.
Yes, we cannot simply stay here forever.

Then why don’t we all try looking for an
<color=#B41919>exit</color>?
Got it! So we’re all on a search again!
